name: otrs
label: OTRS
description: OTRS is a service management suite. OTRS connector provides functionality to create, modify, and search tickets.

fields.title: Host URL
fields.name: url
fields.description: URL of the OTRS server to which you will connect and perform the automated operations.

fields.title: Username
fields.name: username
fields.description: Username for your account to access the OTRS server to which you will connect and perform the automated operations.

fields.title: Password
fields.name: password
fields.description: Password for your account to access the OTRS server to which you will connect and perform the automated operations.

fields.title: Verify SSL
fields.name: verify_ssl
fields.description: Specifies whether the SSL certificate for the server is to be verified or not. By default, this option is set as True.

operations.title: Create Ticket
operations.description: Creates a new OTRS ticket based on the input parameters specified.

parameters.title: Title
parameters.name: title
parameters.description: Title of the ticket which you want to create in OTRS.

parameters.title: Queue
parameters.name: queue
parameters.tooltip: Queue for this ticket to go into.
parameters.description: Queue to which the ticket needs to be created in OTRS.

parameters.title: State
parameters.name: state
parameters.description: State of the the ticket that needs to be created in OTRS.

parameters.title: Priority
parameters.name: priority
parameters.description: Priority of the the ticket that needs to be created in OTRS.

parameters.title: Customer User
parameters.name: customer
parameters.tooltip: Name of the customer user for this ticket.
parameters.description: Customer name of the the ticket that needs to be created in OTRS.

parameters.title: Article Subject
parameters.name: article_subject
parameters.tooltip: Subject text to use for this ticket's initial article.
parameters.description: Article subject of the the ticket that needs to be created in OTRS.

parameters.title: Article Body
parameters.name: article_body
parameters.tooltip: Body text for this ticket's initial article.
parameters.description: Article body of the the ticket that needs to be created in OTRS.

operations.title: List Tickets
operations.description: Retrieves tickets from OTRS based on the input parameters specified.

parameters.title: State
parameters.name: state
parameters.description: State of the the ticket that needs to be searched in OTRS.

parameters.title: Ticket Title
parameters.name: ticket_title
parameters.description: Search a ticket based on the title provided in OTRS.

parameters.title: Ticket-Type
parameters.name: tickettype
parameters.description: Ticket type of the the ticket that needs to be searched in OTRS.

operations.title: Get Ticket
operations.description: Retrieves particular ticket from OTRS based on the ticket ID you have specified.

parameters.title: Ticket ID
parameters.name: ticket_id
parameters.description: The ID of the ticket that needs to be retrieved from OTRS.

operations.title: Update Ticket
operations.description: Updates a OTRS ticket based on the input parameters specified.

parameters.title: Ticket ID
parameters.name: ticket_id
parameters.description: The ID of the ticket that needs to be updated in OTRS.

parameters.title: Title
parameters.name: title
parameters.description: The title of the ticket that needs to be updated in OTRS.

parameters.title: Queue
parameters.name: queue
parameters.tooltip: Queue for this ticket to go into.
parameters.description: Queue to which the ticket needs to be updated in OTRS.

parameters.title: State
parameters.name: state
parameters.description: The state of the ticket that needs to be updated in OTRS.

parameters.title: Priority
parameters.name: priority
parameters.description: The priority of the ticket that needs to be updated in OTRS.

parameters.title: Customer User
parameters.name: customer
parameters.tooltip: Name of the customer user for this ticket.
parameters.description: Customer name of the the ticket that needs to be updated in OTRS.

parameters.title: Article Subject
parameters.name: article_subject
parameters.tooltip: Subject text to use for this ticket's updated article.
parameters.description: Article subject of the the ticket that needs to be updated in OTRS.

parameters.title: Article Body
parameters.name: article_body
parameters.tooltip: Body text for this ticket's updated article.
parameters.description: Article body of the the ticket that needs to be updated in OTRS.

parameters.title: DynamicField
parameters.name: dynamicField
